Static Public Member Functions

(NSString *) + base64md5FromData:
 Returns a Base 64 encoded MD5 of the given data.

Member Function Documentation

+ (NSString * AmazonMD5Util.)base64md5FromStream: (NSInputStream *)  inputStream  

Returns a Base 64 encoded MD5 of the data read from the given input stream.

The stream is expected to already have been opened. The caller is expected to close the stream. Nil will be returned if the MD5 could not be properly computed.

Exceptions:
NSException thrown if unable to read stream.
